title: Benjamin Renia
text:
Benjamin Renia (born 7 March 1990) is a French <a href="Canoe%20slalom">slalom canoeist</a> who has competed at the international level since 2008.
He won a gold medal in the <a href="2021%20ICF%20Canoe%20Slalom%20World%20Championships%20%E2%80%93%20Teams">K1 team event</a> at the <a href="2021%20ICF%20Canoe%20Slalom%20World%20Championships">2021 World Championships</a> in <a href="Bratislava">Bratislava</a>.
